description: A Learning resource or other activity that is on a person's career or learning roadmap

_id.description: The unique identifier for a resource used by a person

personId.description: The ID of the person this item was assigned to

resourceId.description: The ID of the resource assigned

topicId.description: The ID of the topic associated with the resource

adhoc.description: This is an adhoc assignment. This document will not have a resourceId and will use a one-off name/link

name.description: The Resource Short Name for adhoc resources

link.description: The Resource Link for adhoc resources

roadmapGroup.description: The top level grouping Now, Next, Later, Celebrated

statusDate.description: Date the status was last changed

completed.description: Date/time the item was checked off

review.description: Free text review of the person's experience with this resource
